recipes.name: Classic Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and basil drizzled with olive oil. Summer on a plate.
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a platter.
Tuck basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately.

recipes.name: Pasta Arrabbiata
recipes.description: Fiery tomato sauce with garlic and red chilies tossed with pasta.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat olive oil, fry garlic and chilies until fragrant.
Add tomatoes and simmer 10 minutes until thick.
Toss with drained pasta and garnish with parsley.

recipes.name: Classic Bruschetta
recipes.description: Crispy bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and garlic.
instructions: Toast bread slices until golden.
Rub each slice with a garlic clove.
Mix tomatoes, basil, olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Top toast with tomato mixture and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Mediterranean Yogurt Bowl
recipes.description: Greek yogurt topped with honey, nuts, and fresh fruits.
instructions: Mix yogurt with vanilla and orange zest.
Divide between two bowls.
Top with honey, nuts, figs, berries, and chia seeds.
Garnish with fresh mint and serve.

recipes.name: Traditional Ratatouille
recipes.description: A colorful medley of vegetables simmered with herbs.
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Add eggplant and peppers, cook 10 minutes.
Add zucchini, tomatoes, and herbs.
Simmer covered 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.

recipes.name: Greek Village Salad
recipes.description: Crisp vegetables, creamy feta, and Kalamata olives.
instructions: Arrange vegetables on a platter.
Top with feta chunks and olives.
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, and oregano.
Drizzle dressing over salad and rest 10 minutes.

recipes.name: Stuffed Eggplant with Herbs
recipes.description: Tender eggplant filled with herbed rice, tomatoes, and spices.
instructions: Scoop out eggplant flesh, leaving a 1 cm border.
Mix rice, tomatoes, nuts, herbs, and spices.
Stuff eggplant shells with the mixture.
Bake at 190°C / 375°F for 35–40 minutes until tender.

recipes.name: Stuffed Grape Leaves (Dolmas)
recipes.description: Grape leaves stuffed with herbed rice and pine nuts.
instructions: Sauté onion until soft; add rice and herbs.
Cook rice until just tender; cool completely.
Place filling on grape leaves and roll tightly.
Steam for 30 minutes; serve with lemon.

recipes.name: Smoky Baba Ganoush
recipes.description: Roasted eggplant dip with tahini, lemon, and garlic.
instructions: Roast eggplants over flame until charred and soft.
Scoop out flesh and drain excess liquid.
Blend with tahini, garlic, lemon juice, and oil.
Garnish with paprika and pomegranate seeds; serve.

recipes.name: Vegan Tomato & Basil Panini
recipes.description: Toasted panini with cashew mozzarella, juicy tomatoes, and fresh basil.
ingredients: 1/2 cup cashew mozzarella or vegan cheese
instructions: Assemble bread with vegan cheese, tomato, and basil; season.
Brush outside with olive oil.
Grill in a panini press or skillet until golden and melty.

recipes.name: Hearty Minestrone Soup
recipes.description: Bean, vegetable, and pasta soup in a tomato-herb broth.
instructions: Sauté onion, carrot, celery, and garlic in olive oil.
Add tomatoes, broth, beans, oregano; simmer 15 minutes.
Add pasta and zucchini; cook until pasta is al dente.
Season and garnish with parsley or nutritional yeast.

recipes.name: Vegan Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Arborio rice gently stirred with mushrooms and vegetable stock, finished with nutritional yeast.
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until translucent.
Add mushrooms; cook until browned.
Stir in rice; toast 1–2 minutes, then add wine to deglaze.
Add hot stock a ladle at a time, stirring until absorbed before the next.
Finish with vegan butter, nutritional yeast, and parsley; season.

recipes.name: Marinated Olives & Roasted Peppers
recipes.description: Herb-marinated olives with sweet roasted peppers and garlic.
instructions: Combine olives, roasted peppers, garlic, oregano, and lemon zest.
Toss with olive oil and vinegar; marinate 15 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Chickpea Flour Omelette (Egg-Free)
recipes.description: Besan batter with onions, spinach, and herbs cooked like an omelette—no eggs.
instructions: Whisk chickpea flour, water, turmeric, baking soda, and salt into a smooth batter.
Stir in cumin, onion, spinach, cilantro, and chili.
Heat a lightly oiled nonstick pan; pour batter and spread.
Cook until set and golden on both sides; serve hot.

recipes.name: Falafel Wrap with Tahini
recipes.description: Crispy falafel tucked into pita with tahini sauce and fresh vegetables.
ingredients: 2 cups dried chickpeas, soaked overnight and drained
Tahini sauce (tahini, lemon juice, water, salt)
instructions: Pulse chickpeas, onion, garlic, herbs, spices, baking powder, and salt until coarse.
Rest mixture 20 minutes; shape into balls or patties.
Fry until deep golden or bake at 200°C / 400°F until crisp.
Serve in pita with vegetables and tahini sauce.

recipes.name: Vegan Moussaka with Lentils
recipes.description: Roasted eggplant layered with spiced lentils and a silky cashew béchamel.
ingredients: 1 cup dried brown or green lentils, rinsed
For cashew béchamel: 1 cup cashews (soaked), 2 cups water, 2 tbsp nutritional yeast, 2 tbsp cornstarch, pinch nutmeg, salt
instructions: Roast eggplant slices brushed with oil at 200°C / 400°F until tender.
Simmer lentils with onion, garlic, tomatoes, stock, cinnamon, and oregano until thick; season.
Blend béchamel ingredients until smooth; heat and whisk until thickened.
Layer eggplant, lentils, and béchamel; bake 20 minutes to set.

recipes.name: Muhammara (Red Pepper & Walnut Dip)
recipes.description: Roasted red pepper, walnuts, garlic, and pomegranate molasses blended into a silky dip.
instructions: Blend peppers, walnuts, garlic, pomegranate molasses, olive oil, lemon, cumin, salt, and pepper until smooth.
Adjust thickness with breadcrumbs if desired; chill before serving.
